title: Server focus not switching in Connections pane after RDP session established
author: vestajpl
body_snippet:
Running v1.76.20.24615 and when I connect via RDP to multiple servers, I can see multiple tabs under the General tab for each connection, however when I switch between tabs, in the left-pane under Connections, the focus/blue highlight does not switch to the same server I have switch to.

Conversely, when I switch between Connections, the session in the General tab does not switch accordingly to that server in the right-hand pane.

Can you please fix these bugs?

Thanks!
